text:
Let's welcome two more friends
to join us

on our continuing journey
that is 2021.

That's deep, Trevor. Say hello
to Jason Maybaum and Sky Katz

- from "Raven's Home."
- Yo.

What up? Guys, what is your plan
for 2021?

Well, I am so excited
for the new year,

so my plan is to hopefully,
when it's safe and approved,

be able to see
my extended family

and all of my friends
in person

and not just on
a video call.

I'm kinda gonna piggyback
off of that.

Along with spending more
quality time with my friends

and grandparents,
I hope to travel

and just get to do all the
things that we had to skip

- during 2020.
- I feel that 100%.

When this is done,
I'm just gonna travel so much.

Yo, we could shoot this show
in Bali.

Ooh.
I like that idea.
We're linking up in Indonesia.

If you've been on this show,
you're invited,

so let everyone know.
Of course, when it's safe,

we're gonna go do that.
So, see you guys soon.

- Bye.
- Bye.
